details.judgement: The predicted edit correctly identifies the intended punctuation edit. Both the ground truth and prediction indicate the addition of a period after the word 'Shadow'. Although the prediction provides less context ('Shadow' instead of the complete title 'Sun and Shadow'), it still accurately captures the core punctuation change. Therefore, considering the requirements—exact match of edit type ('punctuation') and accurate capture of core textual edit (adding period after 'Shadow')—the prediction is correct.
